author: henning
msg: The experimental "build Turbine with Eclipse and without Maven"
code. Moved into the CVS to give it more exposition to the user
base. Wants docs and some testing. Should be ready for moving in by
the time we start 2.4, hopefully dragging a few more hands in to work

author: henning
msg: Add methods to pull absolute and relative URIs from the content tool
without looking at the default method. This might necessary if you
use relative links but need a few absolute links (e.g. for Batik/FOP).

author: henning
msg: add isDebugEnabled() around some expensive log.debug calls
